Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Design.DBParametersEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 表示与 相关的参数的集合以及它们各自到 中列的映射。

span.span: Represents a collection of parameters relevant to an as well as their respective mappings to columns in a .

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用命名参数时，集合中的参数的数量必须等于命令文本中的命名参数的数目或适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序将引发错误。When using named parameters, the number of parameters in the collection must be equal to the number of named parameters within the command text, or the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle raises an error. 将参数传递给 SQL 语句调用的适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持的问号 （？） 占位符的`CommandType.Text`。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`. 在这种情况下，必须使用命名的参数。In this case, named parameters must be used. 例如:For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` 使用名为 SQL 语句中的参数调用时的`CommandType.Text`，你必须在前面参数名称后的加冒号 （:）。When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:). 但是，在存储过程中，或在其他位置中你的代码的命名参数引用时 (例如，当添加对象添加到属性)，不要在前面添加冒号 （:） 的命名的参数。However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding objects to the property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:). 数据提供程序会自动提供冒号。The data provider supplies the colon automatically. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的多个实例通过内。The following example creates multiple instances of through the within the . 这些参数用于选择数据库中的数据，然后在其中放置数据。These parameters are used to select data within the database and then place the data in the . 此示例假定和已创建具有适当的架构、 命令和连接。This example assumes that a and an have already been created with the appropriate schema, commands, and connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleParameter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleParameter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleParameter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleParameter/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载时要格外小心方法，以指定整数参数值。Use caution when using this overload of the method to specify integer parameter values. 因为此重载接受 类型的 `value`，所以当此值为零时，必须将整数值转换为 类型，如下面的 C# 示例所示。Because this overload takes a `value` of type , you must convert the integral value to an type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates. ``` parameters.Add("pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ``` 如果不执行此转换，则编译器将假定你尝试调用`OracleParameterCollection.Add`(`string`， `OracleType`) 重载。If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler will assume you are attempting to call the `OracleParameterCollection.Add` (`string`, `OracleType`) overload.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例搜索与给定内。The following example searches for an with a given within an . 如果该参数存在，此示例将显示的名称和参数的索引。If the parameter exists, the example displays the name and index of the parameter. 如果不存在该参数，此示例将显示错误。If the parameter does not exist, the example displays an error. 此示例假定已创建。This example assumes that an has already been created.
